description: Gather materials needed for making tea.
name: Gather Tea Materials
pseudocode:
1. Identify required materials (water, tea leaves/bag, cup, kettle/pot, heat source).
2. Collect each material.

description: Make tea using the gathered materials.
name: Make Tea
pseudocode:
1. Boil water using kettle/pot and heat source.
2. Place tea leaves/bag into the cup.
3. Pour hot water into the cup.
4. Steep for appropriate time.
5. Remove tea leaves/bag (if necessary).
6. Enjoy the tea.
